name: Don't let the ninja put you on his head!
name_original: Don't let the ninja put you on his head!
description:
A masterful experience that's bound to make you laugh. Run from the ninja who's trying to put you on his head in order to become the nabunaga king and rule the world.

Roll under pelicans.

Eat cat food.

Drink milk.

Grab some yarn.

Dodge shurikens.

Play our game and I personally guarantee you'll have a good time.
